            "categoryId" "1",

            ],
            "popup" 
                "title" "River Arkhen",
                "description" "Also known as the River Elzimmer,  the river ran through the Arkhen Vale in the Dalelands, down to Selgaunt Bay in Sembia.",

                    "url" "River Arkhen",
                    "label" "River Arkhen"

            "popup" 
                "title" "Selgaunt Bay",
                "description" "The bay of Selgaunt where the Sea of Fallen Stars touched the city and the River Arkhen drained into the sea.",

            "popup" 
                "title" "Oxblood Quarter",
                "description" "The district two blocks away from Selgaunts western gate. Home of Selgaunts stockyards, tanneries, and dye shops.",

                "description" "Also known as the Avenue of the Temples, the primary location of Selgaunts many temples and shrines.",

            ],
            "popup" 
                "title" "Ariness Street",
                "description" "A gloomy and dimly illuminated street where the Six Coins trading coster stood, later taken over by the Night Knives thieves guild. The street was dotted with caravan warehouses.",

                    "url" "Ariness Street",
                    "label" "Ariness Street"
            ,
            "id" "8"
        ,

            "position" [
                628.61926812098,
                483.66585542327
            ],
            "popup" 
                "title" "Night Knife Guildhouse",
                "description" "Once the business office of the Six Coins trading coster, but by the late 14 century DR, it was hollowed out and taken over by the Night Knives. The thieves guild itself was destroyed in \nHammer 1371 DR.",
                "link" 
                    "url" "Night Knife Guildhouse",
                    "label" "Night Knife Guildhouse"
            ,
            "id" "9"
        ,

                729.93844773357
            ],
            "popup" 
                "title" "Sarn Street",
                "description" "The street that hugged the Palace of the Hulorn and the Hunting Gardens southern side and ran southwest. The street was home of many noble estates and tall-houses.",

                    "url" "Sarn Street",
                    "label" "Sarn Street"
            ,

            ],

        ,

                1077.335630241,

            ],
            "popup" 
                "title" "Galgorgars Ride",
                "description" "The wide wagon street that stretched from the heart of the city, north towards the High Bridge and turned into Rauthauvyrs Road that led to the city of Ordulin.",

                "title" "High Bridge",
